languages.text: {n}Клеменциа выглядит немного растрепанной, однако в прочем сохраняет привычный вид: стальной взгляд и сжатые губы свидетельствуют о предельной собранности.{/n} "Благодарение Трону, Ваша Светлость, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}вы здесь{/d}! Вы как никогда нужны сейчас своим подданным!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Клеменциа выглядит немного растрепанной, однако в прочем сохраняет привычный вид: стальной взгляд и сжатые губы свидетельствуют о предельной собранности.{/n} "Благодарение Трону, Ваше Благородие, вы здесь! Вы как никогда нужны сейчас своим подданным!"

languages.text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа выглядит немного растрепанной, однако в прочем сохраняет привычный вид: стальной взгляд и сжатые губы свидетельствуют о предельной собранности.{/n} "Благодарение Трону, Ваша Светлость, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}вы здесь{/d}! Вы как никогда нужны сейчас своим подданным!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little disheveled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you're here! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

{n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you're here! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

{n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, you're here! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアの身なりは多少乱れているが、他は変わりない様子だ―厳しいまなざしと固く閉じた唇は、彼女が完全に冷静であることを示している。{/n}「信じられません、陛下。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}戻ってきてくださった{/d}んですね！臣下たちは皆、かつてないほど陛下を必要としています！」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアの身なりは多少乱れているが、他は変わりない様子だ―厳しいまなざしと固く閉じた唇は、彼女が完全に冷静であることを示している。{/n}「信じられません、陛下。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}戻ってきてくださった{/d}んですね！臣下たちは皆、かつてないほど陛下を必要としています！」

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅有些蓬头垢面，但她的仪容并没有受到影响。她目光刚毅，嘴唇紧闭，整个人散发着毫不动摇的镇定。{/n}“赞美黄金王座，大人！在您的臣民最需要您的时刻，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}您终于来了{/d}！”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅有些蓬头垢面，但她的仪容并没有受到影响。她目光刚毅，嘴唇紧闭，整个人散发着毫不动摇的镇定。{/n}“赞美黄金王座，大人！在您的臣民最需要您的时刻，您终于来了！”

languages.text: {n}Clementia parece un tanto desaliñada, pero por lo demás sigue igual. Su mirada férrea y sus labios apretados reflejan una compostura impecable.{/n} «¡Loado sea el Trono, mi{mf|lord|lady}, por fin {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}ha venido{/d}! ¡Sus súbditos le necesitan más que nunca!».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia parece un tanto desaliñada, pero por lo demás sigue igual. Su mirada férrea y sus labios apretados reflejan una compostura impecable.{/n} «¡Loado sea el Trono, mi{mf|lord|lady}, por fin ha venido! ¡Sus súbditos le necesitan más que nunca!».

languages.text: {n}Hormis ses cheveux légèrement en désordre, Clémentia arbore son apparence habituelle : son regard d'acier et ses lèvres pincées soulignent son sang-froid à toute épreuve.{/n} « Que le Trône soit loué ! Votre Seigneurie, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}vous voilà{/d} ! Plus que jamais, vos sujets ont besoin de vous ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hormis ses cheveux légèrement en désordre, Clémentia arbore son apparence habituelle : son regard d'acier et ses lèvres pincées soulignent son sang-froid à toute épreuve.{/n} « Que le Trône soit loué ! Votre Seigneurie, vous voilà ! Plus que jamais, vos sujets ont besoin de vous ! »

languages.text: {n}Clementia wirkt ein wenig zerzaust, aber abgesehen davon hat sich ihr Aussehen nicht verändert – der stählerne Blick und die fest zusammengepressten Lippen zeugen von perfekter Selbstbeherrschung.{/n} "Der Thron sei gepriesen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}Ihr seid hier{/d}! Eure Untertanen brauchen Euch jetzt mehr denn je!"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia wirkt ein wenig zerzaust, aber abgesehen davon hat sich ihr Aussehen nicht verändert – der stählerne Blick und die fest zusammengepressten Lippen zeugen von perfekter Selbstbeherrschung.{/n} "Der Thron sei gepriesen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Ihr seid hier! Eure Untertanen brauchen Euch jetzt mehr denn je!"

languages.text: {n}Clementia, biraz dağınık olması dışında aynı görünüyor. Çelik rengi gözleri ve birbirine sıkıca yapışan dudakları, mükemmel itidalini yansıtıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Taht'a şükürler olsun ki {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}gelmişsiniz{/d}! Tebaanızın size her zamankinden çok ihtiyacı var!"
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia is looking a little dishevelled, but her appearance otherwise remains unchanged — her steely gaze and tightly pressed lips speak of perfect composure.{/n} "Praise the Throne, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusEarly}you're here{/d}! Your subjects need you now more than ever!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia, biraz dağınık olması dışında aynı görünüyor. Çelik rengi gözleri ve birbirine sıkıca yapışan dudakları, mükemmel itidalini yansıtıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Taht’a şükürler olsun! Gelmişsiniz! Tebaanızın size her zamankinden çok ihtiyacı var!"
